wigneshwaran maha amathi apekshaka lesa idiripath kirimata kamaththa palakirimath samaga senathiraja thaman maha amathi apekshaka bawa kiyamin genayamin siti pa්rachara nawathwanu athayida mahathmayeku lesa wiganeshwaranta idadi pasekata wanu athayida sambandhan apeksha kaleya.kesewuwath senathiraja me sambandhayen kisidu adahasak palanokaleya.emenma sambandhan apeksha kala paridden thaman maha amathi apekshakathwayen iwath wana bawata ohu niwedanayak nikuth kaleda natha. 2013 juli masa 11 wanida bambalapitiye pihiti ilangeyi thamil arasu kachchi paksha karyalayedi demala sandhana sambandhikarana kamituwa hamuwuye uthuru palath maha amathi apekshakaya sambandhayen awasan thiiranayak ganimataya.demala sandhanayata sambandha anek paksha wala niyojithayo wiwidha adahas pala kalaha.kisith noki sambandhan owunta katha kirimata idadi nihada wiya.owuhu siyaludenama kiya sitiye ilangeyi thamil arasu kachchi pakshaye mahalekam mawayi senathiraja maha amathidhurayata niyama sudussa wana bawath ohu wenuwen thama paksha wala sahaya labadena bawathya.namuth wismaya danawana ayurin ilangeyi thamil arasu kachchi pakshaye samajikayo owungema mahalekamwaraya maha amathidhurayata sudusu nowana bawa pawasamin ee sadaha wigneshwarange nama idiripath kalaha.
